tachyon.client

Class LocalBlockOutStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • tachyon.client.OutStream
        • tachyon.client.BlockOutStream
          • tachyon.client.LocalBlockOutStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class LocalBlockOutStream
extends BlockOutStream
    This implementation of BlockOutStream writes a single block to the local file system. This should not be created directly, but should be instantiated through one of the BlockOutStream.get() methods.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class tachyon.client.OutStream
